title: Getting much better.
comment: Great app, but as of 12/2 doesn't work with instances that are set to 'private.'

title: In the right direction
comment: Love the app. Just keep holo-fying it and adding new features and I would even buy a premium version.  Awesome work!

title: Great mod, great dev
comment: Dev is very responsive and was able to squash a bug that they weren't able to reproduce. Also, love the app.
